function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited capacity to prevent virus transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and infection within residential facilities","Mitigation":"Implementing measures such as proper ventilation, regular disinfection, and designated isolation areas","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV-C disinfection, smart building management systems","People":"Occupants of residential facilities","Owner":"Building management and owners"},{"Description":"Lack of self-sufficiency for extended periods of isolation","Impact":"Inadequate access to medical treatment, food reserves, and essential supplies during isolation","Mitigation":"Stockpiling essential supplies, establishing medical facilities within the residential complex, and implementing food supply management systems","Technologies":"Smart inventory management systems, telemedicine technology, vertical farming systems","People":"Occupants of residential facilities","Owner":"Building management and owners"},{"Description":"Increased domestic violence due to lockdowns","Impact":"Rise in domestic abuse cases and lack of support for victims within residential facilities","Mitigation":"Building emergency shelters, providing support services for domestic violence victims, and implementing policies to address the issue","Technologies":"Smart security systems, emergency communication networks, community support platforms","People":"Victims of domestic violence within residential facilities","Owner":"Building management and owners"}]}
